com.oracle.truffle.tools.agentscript

Class FrameLibrary

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.oracle.truffle.api.nodes.Node
      • com.oracle.truffle.api.library.Library
        • com.oracle.truffle.tools.agentscript.FrameLibrary
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.oracle.truffle.api.nodes.NodeInterface, Cloneable

    public abstract class FrameLibrary
extends com.oracle.truffle.api.library.Library
    Encapsulating access to execution frames. GraalVM Insight scripts can access local variables of the dynamically instrumented source code. This library handles such accesses. Implement your own to respond to various messages (like FrameLibrary.readMember(com.oracle.truffle.tools.agentscript.FrameLibrary.Query, java.lang.String)) in a different way - for example by exposing more than it is in their frames for some specific languages.

    It is expected more messages appear in this library during its evolution. Such messages will be provided with their appropriate default implementation.

    Since:
    20.1
